description: small handle cup and saucer decorated with geometric bands and floral bouquets in Art Deco containers; yellow, black, blue, purple, green, pink and brilliant orange
inscription:
Inscription and Mark

on bottom of each piece, in green: [(lion)/ ROYAL DOULTON/ (intertwined D\'s)/ MADE IN ENGLAND]; on bottom of each piece, in black: [5/86 I]; on bottom of saucer, in black: [R.A. 407/ V. 30] and [V23]; on bottom of cup, in black: [V23/ 2.]; on bottom of saucer, in red: fleur-de-lis
life_date: Burslem, Staffordshire, and Stoke-on-Trent, English, est. 1815
title: Demitasse cup and saucer
